description: Movie director Tachibana plans a special movie feature for his 30th anniversary, named "Hiiragi no Toki" (柊の季節, The Season of the Holly), casting http://anidb.net/ch40717 [Kanzaki Akane] and newcomer http://anidb.net/ch40719 [Sannou Yoriko] for the lead roles, to the bewilderment of http://anidb.net/ch40720 [the press].
name: Tachibana
